thread.section_title: Cook Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cook Travel | www.cooktravel.net
thread.title: Valued Customer- Nancy M
thread.title_full: Cook Travel reviewed by Valued Customer- Nancy M

author: Valued Customer- Nancy M
title: Valued Customer- Nancy M
text:
I worked with Sanjay for First Class Air to Scotland. He was very knowledgeable and professional. He helped us find the best fares as well as the best connections. He was always available to answer questions during the selection as well as with an unexpected airline change to our flight months after booking. He got thing done efficiently and was a delight to talk to.
I felt totally confident with his expert guidance of our important plans.
We could never had done as well on our own.
